amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used in contravention of certain laws enacted or regulations promulgated to implement the UN Contravention Against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to contravene laws enacted or regulations promulgated against torture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 415 - 8, 1 Present (Roll no. 261).
